title: Charleston South Carolina Roast Session W DCYoungFly Karlous Miller & Chico Bean | Ep. 177
itunes:title: Charleston South Carolina Roast Session W DCYoungFly Karlous Miller & Chico Bean | Ep. 177
description:
Get Tickets To The Next Live Show in Denver! https://www.altitudetickets.com/event... The next generation of comedy legends, Karlous Miller, DC Young Fly, and Chico Bean take the live show back on the road and make a hilarious stop in Charleston, South Carolina. On this special episode, the whole crowd gets roasted - from the girl that looks like the the girl from US to the man that looks like The Hamburgalur - a roast session breaks out early. Plus Chico Bean makes a brand new live track "Cuse Me" while walking the crowd. The crew goes down memory lane and remembers one of the scariest movies of all time, "Candyman" and recreate one of the scariest things that can happen in real life - getting pulled over by the police. Karlous then tells the story of getting pulled over in Indiana with Chico Bean. During the show, word of Nipsey Hussle's passing reaches the stage and the crew addresses the loss. Then with Lil NAs X tearing up the charts, the squad makes a brand new country song and gets all of Charleston to join in! #85southshow #karlousmiller #dcyoungfly #chicobean KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/ DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/ CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/ GET 85 SOUTH SHOW MERCH: https://www.85southshow.com/live GET 85 SOUTH SHOW LIVE TICKETS!: https://www.85southshow.com/live

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
